import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { updateReviewForm } from '../.././actions/reviews/reviewForm' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' const ReviewForm = ({ formData, updateReviewForm, userId, concertId, review, handleSubmit, editMode}) => { const { performance_score, venue_score, set_score, sound_score, price, write_up } = formData const handleChange = event => { const { name, value } = event.target updateReviewForm(name, value) } return (
{ event.preventDefault() handleSubmit(formData, userId, concertId) }}>
